meanings.definition: The act or process of dividing into fractions.
meanings.sent1: I struggled with the fractionalizations of the pizza slices.
meanings.sent2: Math class focused on understanding fractionalizations of numbers.
meanings.sent3: The chef's fractionalizations of the cake layers made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like a whirlwind of fractionalizations, each thought a tiny piece of a bigger puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The fractionalizations of the rainbow made it a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The state of being divided into fractions.
meanings.sent1: The fractionalizations of the pie made it easy to share with everyone.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the fractionalizations of time can help in planning your day.
meanings.sent3: The fractionalizations of the traffic flow seemed to create chaos on the streets.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the fractionalizations of sunlight through the leaves created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The fractionalizations of the music notes added depth to the melody.
